mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT HOSTEL_CODE, HOSTEL_NAME,HOSTEL_ADDRESS,HOSTEL_SERVICE,HOSTEL_COMFORT,room_type,HOSTEL_SCORE, (SELECT MIN(HOSTEL_PRICE) FROM HOSTEL_OPTION HO WHERE HO.HOSTEL_CODE=H.HOSTEL_CODE AND HO.OPTION_NO IN ( SELECT OPTION_NO FROM HOSTEL_OPTION WHERE (HOSTEL_CODE,HOSTEL_PRICE) IN ( SELECT HOSTEL_CODE , MIN(HOSTEL_PRICE) FROM HOSTEL_OPTION WHERE OPTION_NO NOT IN (SELECT OPTION_NO FROM RESERVED_ROOM WHERE RESERVED_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')) GROUP BY HOSTEL_CODE ) )) AS HOSTEL_PRICE, (SELECT FILEPATH FROM HOSTEL_FILE HF WHERE HF.HOSTEL_CODE = H.HOSTEL_CODE AND FILE_NO = (SELECT MIN(FILE_NO) FROM HOSTEL_FILE HF2 WHERE HF2.HOSTEL_CODE=H.HOSTEL_CODE)) AS HOSTEL_FILEPATH FROM HOSTEL H WHERE H.HOSTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR H.HOSTEL_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' AND H.HOSTEL_CODE IN ( SELECT HOSTEL_CODE FROM HOSTEL_OPTION WHERE (HOSTEL_CODE,HOSTEL_PRICE) IN ( SELECT HOSTEL_CODE , MIN(HOSTEL_PRICE) FROM HOSTEL_OPTION WHERE OPTION_NO NOT IN (SELECT OPTION_NO FROM RESERVED_ROOM WHERE RESERVED_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')) GROUP BY HOSTEL_CODE ) ) ) where room_type = #{roomType}

SELECT * FROM HOSTEL_OPTION WHERE hostel_code=#{hostelCode} and OPTION_NO NOT IN (SELECT OPTION_NO FROM RESERVED_ROOM WHERE RESERVED_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'))
select filepath from hostel_file where hostel_code=#{hostelCode}
